_source.short_desc: Drift is an all-in-one platform that combines Live Chat, Conversational Marketing, and Conversational Sales to help companies grow.
_source.long_desc:
Drift is an all-in-one platform that combines Live Chat, Conversational Marketing, and Conversational Sales to help companies grow revenue and increase customer lifetime value, faster. More than 50,000 businesses use Drift to align sales and marketing on a single platform to deliver a unified customer experience where people are free to have a conversation with a business at any time, on their terms.

We help companies engage in real-time, personalized conversations with the right customers.
_source.target_audience: Drift creates online experiences that put buyers and customers first, so businesses can meet them at the right time, at the right place, and engage them in the right conversation.

media.caption: Drift AI Chatbots: Use Artificial Intelligence to increase quality pipeline that closes faster
Drift Conversation Insights: Prioritize and personalize your marketing, sales, and service efforts with real-time insights into your visitor?s needs and asks.
Drift Deal Room: Manage the entire sales process with your buyers ? all in one place ? to close deals faster and more effectively.
Drift Fastlane: Qualify leads in real-time, engage with buyers instantly, and book meetings directly from your forms.
Drift Prospector: Know where to focus your time and effort, engage your buyers across channels, and take action on your accounts immediately.

category_features.name: Canned Responses
category_features.definition: Shortcuts for inputting frequently used messages

category_features.name: Customizable Branding
category_features.definition: Add customized logos and colors to the interface

category_features.name: Geotargeting
category_features.definition: Geographic location of visitors determines behavior of the software

category_features.name: Offline Form
category_features.definition: Form to collect visitor contact information when live chat isn't available

category_features.name: Proactive Chat
category_features.definition: Copy on the page or chat window encouraging the user to engage with the chat option

category_features.name: Screen Sharing
category_features.definition: Digitally share screen view with others

category_features.name: Third Party Integrations
category_features.definition: Improve business process by accessing more features and applications by combining third party integrations

category_features.name: Transfers/Routing
category_features.definition: Transfer chats and organize messages between agents

category_features.name: Website Visitor Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor activity of individuals who visit your website using cookies

category_features.name: Chatbot
category_features.definition: AI program that learns to perform repetitive data-driven actions such as content or product recommendation, chat automation, etc.

category_features.name: Code-free Development
category_features.definition: Assemble applications and bots from pre-made building blocks without having to write software code or knowing a programming language

category_features.name: Contextual Guidance
category_features.definition: Interprets what a user is doing based on context and helps guide them through the process.

category_features.name: For Developers
category_features.definition: For the intention to be used by developers

category_features.name: Intent Recognition
category_features.definition: Helps understand a user's intentions/actions

category_features.name: Live Chat
category_features.definition: Ability to chat online in real time

category_features.name: Multi-Channel Communication
category_features.definition: Allows support from multiple channels including email, live chat, phone, and social media.

category_features.name: Multi-Language
category_features.definition: Recognize and support multiple languages/dialects

category_features.name: Pre-Configured Bot
category_features.definition: Bot template that exists within the system. Does not require any customization to use.

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Sentiment Analysis
category_features.definition: Categorize emotions expressed in written text and identify if they are positive, negative or neutral

category_features.name: Speech Recognition
category_features.definition: Train your system to interpret and transcribe voice messages

category_features.name: Speech Synthesis
category_features.definition: The ability of a bot to respond to user queries in synthesised voice

category_features.name: Multi-Channel Communication
category_features.definition: Allows support from multiple channels including email, live chat, phone, and social media.

related_products.short_desc: Zendesk offers industry leading live chat software that?s quick to implement and easy to use.
related_products.features: Zendesk offers industry leading live chat software that's quick to implement and easy to use. It lets you deliver real time, conversational support on web, mobile, and in apps-like WhatsApp. Pair it seamlessly with Zendesk's customer support solution to reduce customer wait times and increase efficiency. Response times can be as fast as 30 seconds and agent performance can improve by 25% after switching to Zendesk.

related_products.short_desc: Engage visitors to your website 24/7 with Pipedrive's Chatbot and Live Chat. Turn your window shoppers into qualified leads.
related_products.features: Turn your website window shoppers into qualified leads with Pipedrive's Chatbot and Live Chat. Chatbot engages your website visitors 24/7. Easily customize your bot's look, the questions it asks and how it replies. Have available sales reps add a human touch with Live Chat from their phones or desktop. If your team gets busy, Chatbot steps in so no leads slip away. Both tools are available in the LeadBooster add-on, which can be added to any Pipedrive CRM plan. Start your 14-day free trial.

related_products.short_desc: Zoho Desk embeddable live chat widgets for your customer service team. Now you can support your customers through your website & apps.
related_products.features: Zoho Desk is a cloud-based helpdesk solution from Zoho. Key features include management of customer support tickets, support portal, contract management & report creation. With Zoho Desk's embeddable live chat widgets make instant responses for instant happiness. Your customers can get in touch with your agents instantly, right from the help center with contextual AI, so your agents can respond and help them find answers faster. Our free plan gives you 3 users free to head start your operations.

related_products.short_desc: LiveChat lets existing and prospective customers talk to your company via your website and give them a personal experience in real time
related_products.features: LiveChat is a live chat application that can be integrated into your website to capture more leads and close more sales. Having LiveChat on your website means that on-site visitors can send you their questions and receive answers in no time.

related_products.short_desc: Start for Free with LiveAgent and provide excellent customer service with the ultimate help desk solution for companies of all sizes.
related_products.features:
LiveAgent is a fully-featured help desk and live-chat Software with over 195+ integrations. 

Streamline all communication channels and manage them from a single shared company inbox. 

Enjoy social media integrations, unlimited ticket browsing history, call recordings, hybrid ticket streams, and more.

Companies like BMW, Yamaha, Huawei, Orange or Forbesfone use LiveAgent to deliver customer wow to 150M end users worldwide. 

Start with a 14-Day free trial, no credit card needed, no contracts.

related_products.short_desc: Increase customer satisfaction and team efficiency with Intercom's market-leading messenger, smart automation and self-service tools.
related_products.features: Increase customer satisfaction and team efficiency with Intercom's market-leading messenger, smart automation and self-service tools for personalized live chat at scale. Chat with customers in your product, app and on your website and manage conversations in a next-generation Inbox that's easy to set up and use. Plus, leverage a full suite of customer communication tools for sales, marketing and support to engage customers with proactive outbound messaging, interactive product tours and more.

related_products.short_desc: Userlike is the first and only live chat software to help your business win and nurture customers across messaging channels.
related_products.features:
Userlike combines website chat with mobile messaging.

Switch to a better method of customer communication. For your customers, support agents, sales reps and managers. 

Chat with your customers via your website, Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, Telegram and SMS. Connect your chatbot and automate parts of your customer interactions. 

Born and hosted in Germany. Userlike keeps your and your customers' data safe with a 100% GDPR-compliant communication solution.

related_products.short_desc: The worlds #1 customer service platform, empowers every service employee with the innovative tools, and unified data.
related_products.features:
Service Cloud, the world's #1 customer service platform, empowers every service employee from the contact center to the field with the innovative tools. Embed real-time support on your website and in your apps with Chat. 
Start personalized live chats, in-app or online, with your customers based on how they're using your site. Deliver chat around the globe with multilingual support. And scale your customer support with AI-powered chatbots that help answer routine asks.

related_products.short_desc: #1 free live chat and contact center software used by over 8 million companies. Also comes with free CRM and email marketing.
related_products.features: If you are looking for free live chat software for your website, you'll love Bitrix24. First of all, free actually means free ? you can have as many chat sessions as you need, without limitations. Second, we don't limit free edition to a single chat agent ? you get twelve chat agents free of charge. Third, Bitrix24 is a fully featured omnichannel contact center.

related_products.short_desc: Webchat enables you to convert more website visitors into customers and deliver remarkable customer support through live chat
related_products.features:
Birdeye Webchat enables you to capture and convert leads from your website. We allow you to talk to
customers in real-time, use a chatbot to automate responses to frequently asked questions, or if you are busy, text them back when you have a moment. A single unified inbox allows you to manage all customer
conversations in one place. Reporting helps you track the number of active conversations, measure and
compare agent productivity, average resolution time, and much more.

related_products.short_desc: Beautiful Live chat solution with CRM and Help Desk integration and powerful reporting capabilities. GDPR Ready and Accessible. API.
related_products.features:
Olark Live Chat is the easiest way to add live chat to your website. 
Over 40,000 organizations including small businesses, large businesses, non-profits, government entities, and higher education choose Olark. 

Add an Olark chat box to your site and start helping more customers and closing more sales. Olark integrates with a number of CRM, eCommerce and Help Desk platforms to provide you with automation, chatbots, and key customer insights.

GDPR Ready, WCAG 2.1 AA Accessible, and NIST 800-53

similar_products.short_desc: Increase customer satisfaction and team efficiency with Intercom's market-leading messenger, smart automation and self-service tools.
similar_products.features: Increase customer satisfaction and team efficiency with Intercom's market-leading messenger, smart automation and self-service tools for personalized live chat at scale. Chat with customers in your product, app and on your website and manage conversations in a next-generation Inbox that's easy to set up and use. Plus, leverage a full suite of customer communication tools for sales, marketing and support to engage customers with proactive outbound messaging, interactive product tours and more.

similar_products.short_desc: 3CX Live Chat is a free live chat solution that offers extra calling capabilities and team communication features at no cost
similar_products.features: 3CX Live Chat is a free live chat solution with extra calling capabilities and team communication features added at no cost. Resolve issues faster through chat and voice. Visitors can chat, call or video call at the touch of a button without dialing numbers. Forward chats with history to agents or groups. Answer messages remotely with free mobile phone apps. Integrate Business Facebook messages and SMS to answer all communications from the same interface. No per user per month fees!

similar_products.short_desc: Multi-Company Live Chat Software, Secure, Reliable Customer Engagement & Real-Time Customer Support.
similar_products.features:
Vision Helpdesk's Live Chat Software is a secure, real-time multi-company live chat messaging platform that improves customer engagement by helping sales teams to convert website visitors into paying customer

Key Aspects of Live Chat Software -
* User-Friendliness 
* In-Built into Customer Support tools 
* Multi-Company Live Chat Management 
* Device-Independent (Browser-based) 
* Enhance Customer Support Team's productivity 
* Engage Website Visitors to Increase Sales.
* Powerful Automation

similar_products.short_desc: Zoho Desk embeddable live chat widgets for your customer service team. Now you can support your customers through your website & apps.
similar_products.features: Zoho Desk is a cloud-based helpdesk solution from Zoho. Key features include management of customer support tickets, support portal, contract management & report creation. With Zoho Desk's embeddable live chat widgets make instant responses for instant happiness. Your customers can get in touch with your agents instantly, right from the help center with contextual AI, so your agents can respond and help them find answers faster. Our free plan gives you 3 users free to head start your operations.

Service Cloud, the world's #1 customer service platform, empowers every service employee from the contact center to the field with the innovative tools. Embed real-time support on your website and in your apps with Chat.

similar_products.short_desc: Freshchat is a modern messaging software built for customer engagement teams to talk to customers across channels.
similar_products.features:
Freshchat is the modern messaging solution that delivers effortless customer service for the digital-first customer by bringing together artificial and human intelligence across messaging channels.

With the world moving towards contactless service, customers expect on-demand, personalised support on familiar channels that are easily accessible.

This is where businesses use Freshchat's powerful messaging platform to service their customers on various digital channels using a blend of automation

similar_products.short_desc: Ada is an easy to use customer support automation platform.
similar_products.features: As the market leader in Automated Customer Experience (ACX), Ada personalizes customer engagement by putting the power of AI in the hands of the people who know your business best. With Ada, it's simple for non-technical teams to build an automated, enterprise-class chatbot platform that solves 70%+ of customer inquiries.

similar_products.short_desc: Inbenta Messenger module is an omnichannel ticketing and live chat solution that centralizes and speeds up case management using AI.
similar_products.features:
Inbenta Messenger is an omnichannel ticketing and live chat solution that converts all social media, website, and email contacts into a manageable queue. 

This helps agents handle tickets effortlessly from a single platform. 

Additionally, with its AI technology, it is able to smartly prioritize cases and suggest content in real-time to help agents answer questions in a single click. This reduces waiting and average handling times, leading to overall better customer service.

similar_products.short_desc: Zoho SalesIQ is an all-in-one customer engagement, live chat and analytics platform that provides great customer experience.
similar_products.features: Zoho SalesIQ is an all-in-one customer engagement platform that provides live chat software, visitor tracking, AI bots (with code and codeless), audio calling, and more. Using SalesIQ helps unify the efforts of your marketing, sales, and customer support teams, providing a great customer experience and boosting business growth. Get to know your prospects better and increase your sales conversion now.

similar_products.short_desc: Start for Free with LiveAgent and provide excellent customer service with the ultimate help desk solution for companies of all sizes.
similar_products.features:
LiveAgent is a fully-featured help desk and live-chat Software with over 195+ integrations. 

Streamline all communication channels and manage them from a single shared company inbox. 

Enjoy social media integrations, unlimited ticket browsing history, call recordings, hybrid ticket streams, and more.

Companies like BMW, Yamaha, Huawei, Orange or Forbesfone use LiveAgent to deliver customer wow to 150M end users worldwide. 

Start with a 14-Day free trial, no credit card needed, no contracts.

similar_products.short_desc: Tidio is a customer service platform that combines live chat and chatbots to improve customer support and generate more sales.
similar_products.features: Tidio combines live chat and chatbots in one tool, so you can delight your customers and improve your sales. It enables you to engage your visitors in real time, send personalized messages, and offer assistance via chatbots, anytime you are busy. Additionally, it connects to Messenger, Instagram, and email, so you can manage all communication channels from one place. Tidio is available on desktop and mobile, so you can answer messages on the go, from every device.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer requests across different communication channels.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Service software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Service tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Service software enables an organization to manage and track customer relationships and support services. From trouble ticket tracking to complaint resolution reporting, Customer Service software solutions allow organizations to manage and assess the quality of their interactions with customers. Customer Service applications also assist in the management and distribution of an internal knowledge base, providing customer service representatives with the information necessary to resolve customer complaints. Customer Service software is related to Call Center software, Help Desk software and Knowledge Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Help Desk software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Help Desk tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Help Desk software enables organizations to respond more efficiently to users. Support software can aid in answering technical and functional questions by providing improved methodologies for ticket tracking, IT management and customer service support. Integrating these elements improves the ability of customer service departments to provide fast and effective support to employees, end users and customers. Help Desk solutions can also facilitate the flow of new information from users, contributing to an organization's existing knowledge base. Help Desk software is related to Call Center software and Customer Service software .

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Online CRM software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Online CRM tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Online CRM software enables web-based customer interaction, support and relationship management. Online customer relationship management applications provide customers with access to an organization's knowledge base assets, allowing customers to pursue a self-guided path to resolving product-related issues, either via the web or over the phone. Online CRM solutions can help increase the efficiency and utility of a call center, website or help desk by empowering customers to resolve issues on their own without engaging with customer service staff. Online CRM software is related to Customer Relationship Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Remote Work software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Remote Work tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Remote Work software includes a combination of different types of solutions needed for professionals to be efficient and effective in their role from outside a fixed office space. Collaboration and team communication are vital for productive and successful remote work professionals.  Remote Work consists of software like, Softphone, Live Chat, Web Conferencing, Collaboration, Project Management, Remote Support and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Sales Enablement software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Sales Enablement tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Sales Enablement covers content and communication tools that help sales teams show off product information to prospective customers, engage potential leads, and overall boost sales team performance. These solutions align sales with marketing to ensure that the sales team gets the most up to date materials. Sales Enablement software includes presentation tools and gamification applications, as well as collaborative content editing and sharing solutions.

_source.short_desc: Drift's Conversation Cloud lets businesses engage with buyers in a personalized way at every stage of their journey.
_source.long_desc: Drift helps businesses connect with people at the right time, in the right place, with the right conversation. Using our AI-powered Conversation Cloud, businesses can personalize experiences that lead to more quality pipeline, revenue, and lifelong customers.
_source.target_audience: Drift creates online experiences that put buyers and customers first, so businesses can meet them at the right time, at the right place, and engage them in the right conversation.

media.caption: Drift AI Chatbots: Use Artificial Intelligence to increase quality pipeline that closes faster
Drift Conversation Insights: Prioritize and personalize your marketing, sales, and service efforts with real-time insights into your visitor?s needs and asks.
Drift Deal Room: Manage the entire sales process with your buyers ? all in one place ? to close deals faster and more effectively.
Drift Fastlane: Qualify leads in real-time, engage with buyers instantly, and book meetings directly from your forms.
Drift Prospector: Know where to focus your time and effort, engage your buyers across channels, and take action on your accounts immediately.

category_features.name: Email Marketing
category_features.definition: Create and send email blasts/campaigns

category_features.name: Live Chat
category_features.definition: Ability to chat online in real time

category_features.name: Performance Metrics
category_features.definition: A set of indicators that tracks how well an organization, a division, or a particular project are performing

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: AI/Machine Learning
category_features.definition: Software program that continuously adjusts its behavior based on observed data

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Customizable Scoring
category_features.definition: Adjust the weighting of various scoring criteria to control how scores are calculated

category_features.name: Data Enrichment
category_features.definition: Combines data from internal sources with disparate data from other internal systems or external sources

category_features.name: Demographic / Firmographic Data
category_features.definition: Characteristics for segmenting companies or customers

category_features.name: Lead Distribution
category_features.definition: Manually or automatically assign leads to sales reps

category_features.name: Lead Qualification
category_features.definition: Score a lead on their quality or likelihood to buy based on certain behaviors

category_features.name: Multiple Scoring Models
category_features.definition: Create multiple models or equations for generating scores

category_features.name: Predictive Analytics
category_features.definition: Predict future data based on historical data sets

category_features.name: Prioritization
category_features.definition: Arrange activities and tasks based on their relative importance

category_features.name: Process/Workflow Automation
category_features.definition: Design workflow paths once and apply the logic to enable automatic creation of future processes and workflows

related_products.short_desc: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster.
related_products.features: Mailchimp's all-in-one Marketing Platform helps small businesses market smarter so you can grow faster. As the backbone for your customer relationships, they provide AI-powered, user-friendly tools anyone can use to be successful. Mailchimp puts your audience at the center so you can send marketing emails and automated messages, create targeted ad campaigns, build landing pages, send postcards, facilitate reporting and analytics, and sell online.

related_products.short_desc: Over 100,000 customers in more than 120 countries use HubSpot's award-winning software to attract, engage and delight their customers.
related_products.features: HubSpot email marketing software makes it easy to start running personalized email marketing campaigns. The intuitive interface makes list and content creation simple, so you're always sending the most relevant information. You can also monitor your email marketing with baked-in analytics, so you can improve your open and click-through rates. Sign up for free, and start running email campaigns that convert and nurture leads, close customers, and contribute to the growth of your business.

related_products.short_desc: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful website, online store, or portfolio.
related_products.features: Squarespace is the all-in-one platform to build a beautiful online presence. Look like an expert right from the start with award-winning templates for your website, online store, or portfolio. Customize the design to fit your personal style and professional needs. Get found in search by more people with powerful SEO tools. Learn where your website traffic is coming from, what your visitors are looking for, and how they're interacting with your content or products with in-depth Analytics tools.

related_products.short_desc: Campaigns by Pipedrive is a powerful email marketing tool to help you win prospects' attention with beautiful, customizable layouts.
related_products.features:
Campaigns by Pipedrive is a powerful email marketing tool that helps you win your prospects' attention with beautiful, customizable layouts and then keep it with tracking, analytics and filtering features.

Campaigns is as intuitive as Pipedrive's CRM solution. Simply use its drag-and-drop elements to create your layout or choose one of its conversion-optimized email templates. Then, enter your email and use data in Pipedrive to segment your recipients and start sending.

related_products.short_desc:
Drag. Drop. Done.

Our easy-to-use editor makes it simple to customize and design great-looking emails that stand out on any device.
related_products.features:
Connect with customers and prospects in minutes with so many great features including one-click editing & marketing automation!

We provide you with real-time tracking tools that report who's opening, clicking, and sharing your emails so you can keep growing.

If your next steps include list growth, we can help you grow faster with landing pages, leads from Instagram and Facebook social ads, and even SMS text messaging-- Constant Contact has all of the tools you need in one easy-to-use platform!

related_products.short_desc: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you -- everywhere you work.
related_products.features: Nimble is the simple, smart CRM for Office 365 & G Suite that works for you by automatically combining your contacts, communication histories, email inboxes, and calendar appointments with over 250+ SaaS business app contacts and social media connections (including Linkedin, Twitter, Facebook) into one unified team relationship manager.

related_products.short_desc: 130k+ customers use ActiveCampaign for personalized email marketing, giving their contacts exactly what they want, when they want it.
related_products.features: ActiveCampaign helps any business connect and engage with their contacts through powerful, easy-to-use email marketing and contact management. Build newsletters, send triggered campaigns, and create personalized messages targeted to each contact's interests so they get exactly what they want, when they want it. The campaign builder and full template library lets you design beautiful emails with just a few clicks, getting the right emails to the right people. Pricing starts at just $9/month.

related_products.short_desc: Get all the email marketing tools you need to grow your business-at an unbeatable price.
related_products.features: Send better emails with Sendinblue's all-in-1 marketing platform. We empower businesses to run smart campaigns and build strong customer relationships. Design beautiful emails with our Drag & Drop editor and 40+ email templates. Run campaigns with A/B testing, advanced segmentation, and automation tools. Sendinblue is trusted by over 300,000 active users worldwide. Try for free and discover what Sendinblue can do for you!

related_products.short_desc:
Improve Your Email Marketing With Keap
Let our software make your email marketing easier and more effective than ever.
related_products.features: Grow your business with the all-in-one CRM, sales & marketing software for serious business owners. Our platform organizes your customer information and daily work in one place, freeing you up from repetitive tasks so you have more time to focus on growing your business.

related_products.short_desc: Advanced email marketing tools that are easy to use so you can grow your business using newsletters, websites and more.
related_products.features:
Grow your business with MailerLite's fast and scalable email marketing platform.

Create professional newsletters, landing pages and websites using our drag & drop builders or with pre-designed templates. And manage campaigns on-the-go in the iOS app.

Attract subscribers and nurture relationships with advanced features like pop-ups, multi-trigger automations, embedded surveys, Facebook custom audiences and auto resend campaigns. Measure performance with detailed reporting inside your dashboard.

related_products.short_desc: #1 Marketing Platform for Email Marketing.
related_products.features: Email Marketing 360 - Everyone checks their email. In fact, most of us check our email multiple times per day! Therefore, it's key to have a well thought out email marketing campaign. Email Marketing 360 makes designing and creating email campaigns easy. You can even create automated journeys where specific emails are sent to specific people at specific times. No question, email needs to be part of your overall marketing strategy. Get started today.

similar_products.short_desc: Klaviyo is a unified customer platform for email, SMS, and more that gives you direct ownership of your customer data and interactions.
similar_products.features: Klaviyo is a unified customer platform that gives your online brand direct ownership of your consumer data and interactions, empowering you to turn transactions with customers into productive long-term relationships-at scale. Because the Klaviyo database integrates seamlessly with your tech stack, you can get the full story on every customer that visits, and then-from the same platform-use those insights to automate personalized email and SMS communications that make people feel seen.

similar_products.short_desc: Intercom is a Customer Communications Platform that offers an unparalleled user experience, engaging customers across their lifecycle.
similar_products.features: Intercom is the Engagement OS, an open channel between customer and business that is in the product, in the moment, and on their terms. We break down silos, unifying data and systems to create an ongoing dialogue, so companies can make the most of every opportunity.

similar_products.short_desc: Build customer relationships for life with data-first digital marketing
similar_products.features: Meet Salesforce Email Studio. Reach your customers with the world's #1 email marketing platform. Build smarter email - from basic marketing campaigns to sophisticated 1-to-1 messages. Use drag-and-drop segmentation tools to hone your subscriber list, so your messaging is always relevant. Filter millions of profiles in seconds, and get instant counts for sending. Strengthen your customer relationships with email conversations that drive every stage of the customer lifecycle.

similar_products.short_desc: Get all the email marketing tools you need to grow your business-at an unbeatable price.
similar_products.features: Send better emails with Sendinblue's all-in-1 marketing platform. We empower businesses to run smart campaigns and build strong customer relationships. Design beautiful emails with our Drag & Drop editor and 40+ email templates. Run campaigns with A/B testing, advanced segmentation, and automation tools. Sendinblue is trusted by over 300,000 active users worldwide. Try for free and discover what Sendinblue can do for you!

similar_products.short_desc: Advanced Email reporting and segmentation, list management, template management, AB testing, email automation. Top deliverability.
similar_products.features:
Designed for Media, Publishing and Ecommerce companies, Maropost is a premium Email marketing automation platform that allows you to acquire, engage and convert prospects and customers across multiple marketing channels.

We ensure the best deliverability rates in the market (98%) with a dedicated team to take care of your email marketing needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Customer engagement platform for sending automated emails, push notifications, texts, and more to engage and retain your audience.
similar_products.features: Customer.io is the customer engagement platform that enables marketers to build their most sophisticated automated messaging campaigns. With access to your real-time behavioral data, create personalized and relevant messages that engage and retain your customers. Send email, push notifications, text messages, and more all through an intuitive and powerful visual building experience. Built for scale, Customer.io is used by over 4,100 companies, sending over 8 billion messages per year.

similar_products.short_desc: Full-stack Marketing Automation Software. Built for Marketers. Designed for Humans.
similar_products.features:
Create email campaigns from scratch with the drag-and-drop email builder/choose from 150+ templates/upload your own HTML email template file.

Freshmarketer is a full-fledged marketing automation solution for fast-paced marketing teams. It lets you intelligently engage your users across their lifecycle from pre to post-acquisition.

similar_products.short_desc: Omnisend ecommerce email marketing & automation platform that helps you sell more. Compatible with most popular ecommerce platforms.
similar_products.features:
Omnisend is an all-in-one email marketing automation platform built for growth-focused ecommerce brands. Convert visitors into customers, create personalized emails in minutes, and automate your email marketing. Use smart segmentation to create hyper targeted and relevant email messages, earning you more revenue. Omnisend works with all ecommerce platforms including Shopify, Bigcommerce, Magento, WooCommerce and many more.

Join Omnisend Partner program and earn a 20% revenue share.

similar_products.short_desc: Powerful, easy to use marketing automation software that helps generate qualified leads and translate marketing spending into revenue.
similar_products.features: Adobe Marketo Engage does more than just help you create engaging, responsive emails. It intelligently builds and updates customer segments in real time based on their behaviors on other channels, then dynamically sends personalized communications to maximize engagement. Real-time performance metrics allow you to optimize mid-program to increase conversions. Liven up the inbox with impactful email campaigns that are personalized based on your customer's real-time behavior.

similar_products.short_desc: Ortto is a customer data platform, business intelligence tool, and marketing automation all-in-one.
similar_products.features:
With Ortto, you can automate all your emails at exactly the right time. Trigger emails based on time, behavior and interest - like when a website visitor submits a demo request form or abandons your shopping cart without making a purchase.

Ortto helps marketers communicate with their audience, transforming leads into customers and customers into repeat buyers and advocates. Build and manage email lists and design intuitive email campaigns with fully-customizable email templates.

similar_products.short_desc: Act-On email and SMS marketing software helps sales and marketing teams go beyond just email with the power of automation.
similar_products.features:
Make an impact with your audience by sending the right message on the right channel at the right time. With our range of simple-to-build and easy-to-deploy email marketing and SMS messaging solutions, you can design, test, and deploy communications that drive engagement to your target audiences while collecting vital information along the way.

Act-On offers easy to build content templates for email, landing pages, and web forms and provides in-depth reporting for optimization of your campaigns.

similar_products.short_desc: An end-to-end email marketing platform for advanced email operations and data-driven growth.
similar_products.features:
Ongage is an email marketing platform for advanced email marketers who are looking to know their customers better and reach their inboxes at scale.

Ongage has the most powerful email API in the market, a built-in SMTP relay, and segmentation, personalization, and campaign optimization capabilities that you have to see.

Give your email operation a new home with Ongage and capitalize on all your previous platform features, while increasing your cost-effectiveness, deliverability, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: An integrated CRM and marketing solution to build campaigns and send emails directly from your CRM. Choose Simple or Advanced solutions
similar_products.features: Our integrated CRM and marketing solution lets you build campaigns and send emails directly from your CRM, using your data to personalize and segment. New leads can be captured from your website and assigned to sales staff to follow up. Or you can add them directly to an automated marketing campaign, letting you work smarter. The stats package means you can monitor the leads, opportunities and value of closed deals, then track the ROI for each campaign, and optimise your marketing spend.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top All-in-One Marketing Platforms on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of All-in-One Marketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: All-in-One Marketing Platforms provide multiple digital marketing tools for SMBs as part of one comprehensive package. Products offer marketing automation, campaign management, email and social marketing, lead management, landing pages/web forms, dynamic content, and various other marketing features.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Campaign Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Campaign Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Campaign Management software enables organizations to automate the tracking, delivery, reporting and analysis of marketing campaigns and promotions through the integration of customer data sources and the ability to parse the data through a broad range of analytic searches. Using this type of marketing campaign reporting allows organizations to evaluate and optimize multiple campaigns for different business sectors based on real-world analysis of their effectiveness. Campaign Management software is related to Email Marketing software, Marketing Automation software and Search Marketing Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Management software provides powerful tools that enable storage, tracking, and management of contact information throughout an organization. Contact Management applications allow organizations to function more effectively by distributing current contact information for customers, contractors, vendors and others to all levels and locations of an organization. Contact Management solutions also often incorporate efficiency-increasing features such as lead management tools, employee task logs and customer interaction histories. Contact Management software is related to Campaign Management software, Lead Management software and Sales Force Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Relationship Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Relationship Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software enables customer interaction, support and relationship management. The purpose of a CRM application is to enable organizations to better manage their customers through the introduction of reliable systems, processes and procedures. Customer Relationship Management software integrates organizational processes across marketing, sales and customer services. CRM software is related to Contract Management software and Online CRM software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Marketing Automation software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Marketing Automation tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Marketing Automation software enables organizations to automate their marketing functions including campaign creation, market segmentation and response analysis. These applications also allow greater integration between sales staff and management as well as expanded abilities to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing campaigns. Marketing Automation solutions enable the enterprise-wide sharing of information, providing an essential conduit between management, sales and marketing operations. Marketing Automation software is related to Campaign Management software, Email Marketing software and Search Marketing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Survey software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Survey tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Survey software enables the efficient design and management of electronic surveys, polls, and questionnaires for market research, measuring customer satisfaction, and collecting employee feedback, along with many other applications. Survey software automates designing, scheduling, publishing, and conducting surveys while featuring a variety of user feedback formats including: radio buttons, check boxes, drop-down menus, and free-form text fields. Survey solutions also accommodate a variety of methodological approaches and provide data reporting tools. Survey software is related to Business Intelligence software and Reporting software.
